downloadTitle: Windows security on disconnected devices whitepaper
downloadDescription: Learn how to protect disconnected devices using Windows and Microsoft security technology

downloadFile.name: Windows security on disconnected devices whitepaper.pdf

detailsSection: This whitepaper will help you understand the use of a defense in depth strategy when protecting disconnected devices. It's especially relevant for enterprises in the manufacturing, public service, and military industries.
detailsSection_file_name: Windows security on disconnected devices whitepaper.pdf
installInstructionSection: Download and read with a PDF reader (such as Microsoft Edge)
